Text: It's in Japanese by default, copy crack over to be able to change
Where can I found the crack ?

I was intrigued by this game when it came out for PSP couple y. Found out last month this game was coming out for PC and have been waiting patiently for the torrent to this game. :) 

Looking forward to trying this out. Tthanks for the heads up about it being in Japanese by default and changing it to English by copying the crack over. Also, in order to mount the game you need to select the .cue file with "Daemon Tools lite" or other mounting software.
Oh, the PSP version for this came out on Oct. 13, 2012, which happens to be EXACTLY 3 years ago. :D
